text:
@JohnCornyn @DailyCaller @JohnCoryn @SenateGOP & @senatemajldr allowed, participated, & knowingly acquitted a guilty Trump for their personal gain. A guilty Trump who then withheld info of COVID19 causing 121k Americans to DIE so he could golf & CAMPAIGN. A number over 1/3 of all worldwide deaths! 
/3
